thread.section_title: MOO.COM Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MOO.COM | www.moo.com | 2 of 142
thread.title: Mo Ghorbankarimi's

author: Mo Ghorbankarimi's
title: Mo Ghorbankarimi's
text:
I did order some luxury bis cards and it came 1 day later than what they said it's going to be. 2 days before delivery they contacted me and said there maybe a day of delay due to the storm! And they waived my shipping fee of 36$ !!!
I wouldn't even know that it's a day late but they didn't wait for me to complain and even before it was too late they reacted on the issue!
That is dedication.
Cards are with me and I have to say, they are even better than what I would like them to be. And I'm a visual art savvy person and usually not so pleased with any printed materials.
Strongly recommend MOO.
Keep up good work MOO team.
